name: Zeal Veteran Badge
description: Awarded for joining or signing up to the zeal version 01.

name: Streak Master Badge
description: Awarded for maintaining daily activity on the app. The number on the badge represents the consecutive days. If a user misses a day, the streak will reset to 0.

name: Challenge Conqueror Badge
description: Awarded for consistently completing the challenge for a week. If users miss any day, the count will reset to 0.

name: Engagement Dynamo Badge
description: Awarded for joining at least 1 community, posting 5 comments, and 1 post.

name: Active Community Badge
description: Awarded to members of the community who are active in the group on alternative days at least for a month.

name: Longevity Badge
description: Awarded based on the duration of activity of the community.

name: Growth Champion Badge
description: Awarded to the community if 10 or more members join within a week.

name: Heavy Lifter Badge
description: Earned by completing a weight lifting challenge.

name: Flexibility Guru Badge
description: Earned by completing flexibility challenges, mastering a yoga pose or improving flexibility metrics.

name: All-Rounder Badge
description: Earned by completing a diverse range of challenges across different fitness categories.
